00019 void eol_lighting_config()
00020 {
00021   _eol_lighting_max = GL_MAX_LIGHTS;
00022   _eol_global_light_level = 1;
00023   eol_vec3d_set(_eol_global_light_color,1,1,1);

00026 void eol_lighting_close()
00027 {

00029       EOL_LOG_INFO,

00031   );
00032   _eol_lighting_initialized = eolFalse;
00033   eol_resource_manager_free(&_eol_lighting_manager);
00034   _eol_lighting_max = 0;
00035   eol_logger_message(
00036       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00037       "eol_lighting:closed\n"

00041 void eol_lighting_init()
00042 {
00043   eol_logger_message(
00044     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00045     "eol_lighting:initializing\n");
00046   _eol_lighting_manager = eol_resource_manager_init(
00047     "eol_lighting_manager",
00048     _eol_lighting_max,
00049     sizeof(eolLight),
00050     eolTrue,
00051     eol_light_delete,
00052     eol_light_load_data_from_file
00053     );
00054   atexit(eol_lighting_close);
00055   eol_logger_message(
00056     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00057     "eol_lighting:initialized\n");
00058   _eol_lighting_initialized = eolTrue;
00059 }

00066 void eol_light_delete(void *light)
00067 {
00068   eol_light_enable(light,eolFalse);
00069   memset(light,0,sizeof(eolLight));
00070 }

00072 void eol_light_free(eolLight **light)
00073 {
00074   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())return;
00075   if ((light) && (*light))
00076   {
00077     eol_light_enable(*light,eolFalse);
00078   }
00079   eol_resource_free_element(_eol_lighting_manager,(void **)light);
00080 }

00085   return eolTrue;

00088 void eol_light_enable(eolLight *light,eolBool enable)
00089 {
00090   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())return;
00091   if (!light)return;
00092   if (light->lightIndex == -1)return;
00093   if (enable)
00094   {
00095     glEnable(GL_LIGHT0 + light->lightIndex);
00096   }
00097   else
00098   {
00099     glDisable(GL_LIGHT0 + light->lightIndex);
00100   }
00101 }

00103 eolLight *eol_light_new()
00104 {
00105   int index = -1;
00106   eolLight *light = NULL;
00107   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())
00108   {
00109     eol_logger_message(
00110       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00111       "eol_lighting:used uninitialized\n");
00112     return NULL;
00113   }
00114   light = (eolLight *)eol_resource_new_element(_eol_lighting_manager);
00115   if (light == NULL)
00116   {
00117     eol_logger_message(
00118       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00119       "eol_lighting:failed to get new resource\n");
00120     return NULL;
00121   }
00122   index = eol_resource_element_get_index(_eol_lighting_manager,light);
00123   if (index == -1)
00124   {
00125     eol_logger_message(
00126       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00127       "eol_lighting:failed to get valid index for light\n");
00128     eol_light_delete(light);
00129     return NULL;
00130   }
00131   light->lightIndex = index;
00132   /*default sane light parameters*/
00133   light->constantAttenuation = 0.0001f;
00134   light->linearAttenuation = 0.002f;
00135   light->QuadraticAttenuation = 0.0000002f;
00136   light->on = eolTrue;
00137   eol_light_enable(light,eolTrue);
00138   return light;
00139 }
00140 
00141 void eol_lighting_filter_for_position(eolVec3D pos)
00142 {
00143   eolLight *light = NULL;
00144   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())return;
00145   while ((light = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_lighting_manager,light)) != NULL)
00146   {
00147     if (!light->on)continue;
00148     if (light->type > eolLightSpot)continue;
00149     if (eol_distance_between_less_than(pos,light->position,light->radius))
00150     {
00151       eol_light_enable(light,eolTrue);
00152     }
00153     else
00154     {
00155       eol_light_enable(light,eolFalse);
00156     }
00157   }
00158 }

00160 void eol_light_set_color(eolLight *light,eolVec3D color)
00161 {
00162   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())return;
00163   if (!light)return;
00164   eol_vec3d_copy(light->colorSpec,color);
00165   eol_vec3d_copy(light->colorAmbi,color);
00166   eol_vec3d_copy(light->colorDiff,color);
00167 }

00170 {
00171   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())return;
00172   if (!light)return;

00176 void eol_light_turn_on(eolLight *light)
00177 {
00178   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())return;
00179   if (!light)return;
00180   eol_light_enable(light,eolTrue);
00181   light->on = eolTrue;

00184 void eol_light_turn_off(eolLight *light)
00185 {
00186   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())return;
00187   if (!light)return;
00188   eol_light_enable(light,eolFalse);
00189   light->on = eolFalse;

00192 void eol_light_update(eolLight *light)
00193 {
00194   eolUint li;
00195   eolFloat tvec[4];
00196   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())return;
00197   if (!light)return;
00198   if (light->lightIndex <= -1)return;
00199   li = GL_LIGHT0 + light->lightIndex;
00200   switch(light->type)
00201   {
00202     case eolLightArea:
00203       eol_vec3d_into_array(tvec,light->position);
00204       tvec[3] = 0;
00205       glLightfv(li,GL_POSITION, tvec);
00206       break;
00207     case eolLightSpot:
00208       eol_vec3d_into_array(tvec,light->position);
00209       tvec[3] = 1;
00210       glLightfv(li,GL_POSITION, tvec);
00211       eol_vec3d_into_array(tvec,light->direction);
00212       tvec[3] = 0;
00213       glLightfv(li,GL_SPOT_DIRECTION, tvec);
00214       glLightf(li,GL_SPOT_EXPONENT, light->exponent);
00215       glLightf(li,GL_SPOT_CUTOFF, light->angle);
00216       break;
00217     case eolLightAmbient:
00218       break;
00219     case eolLightDirectional:
00220       eol_vec3d_into_array(tvec,light->direction);
00221       tvec[3] = 0;
00222       glLightfv(li,GL_SPOT_DIRECTION, tvec);
00223       break;
00224   }
00225   tvec[3] = 1;
00226   eol_vec3d_into_array(tvec,light->colorSpec);
00227   glLightfv(li,GL_SPECULAR,tvec);
00228   eol_vec3d_into_array(tvec,light->colorAmbi);
00229   glLightfv(li,GL_AMBIENT,tvec);
00230   eol_vec3d_into_array(tvec,light->colorDiff);
00231   glLightfv(li,GL_DIFFUSE,tvec);
00232   glLightf(li,GL_CONSTANT_ATTENUATION, light->constantAttenuation);
00233   glLightf(li,GL_LINEAR_ATTENUATION, light->linearAttenuation);
00234   glLightf(li,GL_QUADRATIC_ATTENUATION, light->QuadraticAttenuation);
00235 }

00237 eolLight *eol_light_area_new()
00238 {
00239   eolLight *light = eol_light_new();
00240   if (light != NULL)
00241   {
00242     light->type = eolLightArea;
00243     light->on = eolTrue;
00244   }
00245   return light;

00259 eolLight *eol_light_ambient_new()
00260 {
00261   eolLight *light = eol_light_new();
00262   if (light != NULL)
00263   {
00264     light->type = eolLightAmbient;
00265     eol_light_move(light,eol_vec3d(0,0,1));
00266     light->on = eolTrue;
00267   }
00268   return light;

00283 void eol_lighting_setup_rep_plot()
00284 {
00285   eolLight *light;
00286   light = eol_light_ambient_new();
00287   if (!light)return;
00288   eol_light_set_color(light,eol_vec3d(0.5,0.5,0.5));
00289   eol_light_update(light);
00290   
00291   light = eol_light_area_new();
00292   if (!light)return;
00293   eol_light_set_color(light,eol_vec3d(1,0.7,0.7));
00294   eol_light_move(light,eol_vec3d(-8,4,1));
00295   eol_light_update(light);
00296   
00297   light = eol_light_area_new();
00298   if (!light)return;
00299   eol_light_set_color(light,eol_vec3d(0.7,0.7,1));
00300   eol_light_move(light,eol_vec3d(8,-4,1));
00301   eol_light_update(light);
00302 }

00304 void eol_light_move(eolLight *light,eolVec3D point)
00305 {
00306   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())return;
00307   if (!light)return;
00308   eol_vec3d_copy(light->position,point);
00309 }

00311 void eol_light_draw(eolLight *light)
00312 {
00313   if (!eol_lighting_initialized())return;
00314   if (!light)return;
00315   eol_draw_dot_3D(light->position,
00316                   5,
00317                   light->colorAmbi,
00318                   1);
00319 }
